content: If a person approached me asking for money while I was walking on the street, I would first assess the situation to ensure my safety. If I felt comfortable and had some spare change on hand, I might consider giving them some money. However, it's also possible that I might not have any money on me at that time, or I might feel uncomfortable giving money to someone I don't know. In such a case, I would politely decline and continue on my way.
